content.title: Scheme Of Assistance To Disabled Persons For Purchase/Fitting Of Aids/Appliances
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: The 'Scheme of Assistance to Disabled Persons for Purchase/Fitting of Aids/Appliances' or the 'ADIP Scheme' was launched on 1st Jan 1981 by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, to assist disabled persons in procuring suitable, durable, scientifically-manufactured, modern, standard aids and appliances, that can promote their physical, social and psychological rehabilitation by reducing the effects of disabilities and enhance their economic potential.
benefits: Full financial assistance for aids/appliances costing up to ₹ 15,000
Financial assistance up to ₹ 15,000 for aids/appliances costing between ₹ 15,001 to ₹ 30,000
50% cost coverage for expensive items costing above ₹ 30,001, subject to income ceiling
Cochlear Implant and post-operative therapy for children with Hearing Impairment with a ceiling of ₹ 7.00 lakh per unit
Traveling costs and boarding/lodging expenses for eligible beneficiaries
eligibility: An Indian citizen of any age
Not having received assistance during the last 3 years for the same purpose
content.application_process: Offline and Online via Common Service Centres (CSCs)
documents_required: A copy of the disability certificate
Address proof (Aadhaar Card, Voter Id Card, Ration Card)
A copy of the Income Certificate
An undertaking that the same aids & assistive devices have not been received from any source during the last three years

faqs.question: What Is Scheme Of Assistance To Disabled Persons For Purchase/Fitting Of Aids/Appliances ADIP Scheme And How It Is Helping Empowering Divyangjan?
faqs.answer: Under the ADIP Scheme, assistive devices are given to PwDs with the aim to improve their independent functioning and arrest the extent of disability and occurrence of secondary disability.

faqs.question: What Are The Documents Required?
faqs.answer: Passport Size Photographs, a copy of the disability certificate, address proof, a copy of the Income Certificate, and an undertaking that the same aids & assistive devices have not been received from any source during the last three years.
